channel.title: Changing owner,mod,and other icons!
channel.description: ok so i just download this PI baseserver and im stuck on how to change your owner crown i just want to make it like just say [Owner] right next to the name not a crown so if anyone can help me with that please reply thank so much :)

item.title: Changing owner,mod,and other icons!
item.dc:creator: @pepse43 pepse43
item.description:
@pepse43 wrote:

I know what you mean… He wants to just delete the crown beside the Owners name…

make a backup cuz i dont know if this will work for you source.

go to your source folder and click you client.java

Now search for this,

if(playerRights == 3){//co owner out.write(
or something like that and just erace it… but try this first, just add this in your client.java under

if(playerRights == 1){//mod out.write(4); }
if there is one, if there isnt then just find a good spot.

ip(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your username")){ out.write(0); }

save then complie your source.

Read full topic
